name: OR_LNLG_LASER_REQ_LABELS
description: This table contains if the laser has the required labels for the laser safety checklist.

columns.name: LASER_SAFETY_CHECKLIST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LSC_HAS_REQUIRED_LABELS_C_NAME
columns.description: Used to document that the laser has the required labels present.
